com.bazaarvoice.bvandroidsdk

Interface Ads

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BVAds

    public interface Ads
    Interface defining Ads module API

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.google.android.gms.ads.AdLoader.Builder getTargetedAdLoader(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String adUnitId)
      Creates a AdLoader.Builder to be used with getTargetedAdRequest in order to request and display a targeted native ads.
      com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherAdRequest.Builder getTargetedAdRequest()
      Creates a PublishedAdRequest.Builder that has appropriately set custom targeting values based on BVAds's personalization data.
      com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherAdView getTargetedAdView(android.content.Context context)
      Creates a PublisherAdView to be used with getTargetedAdRequest in order to request and display targeted banner ads.
      com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherInterstitialAd getTargetedInterstitialAd(android.content.Context context, java.lang.String adUnitId)
      Creates a PublisherInterstitialAd to be used with getTargetedAdRequest in order to get and display a targeted intersitial ad.
      void onAdClosed(AdTracker adTracker)
      Send analytics event when Ad is closed
      void onAdFailedToLoad(AdTracker adTracker, int errorCode)
      Send analytics event when Ad fails to load
      void onAdLeftApplication(AdTracker adTracker)
      Send analytics event when user leaves application when an Ad is displayed

      Send analytics event when Ad is loaded
      void onAdOpened(AdTracker adTracker)
      Send analytics event when an Ad is shown/opened

    • Method Detail

      • getTargetedAdRequest

        com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherAdRequest.Builder getTargetedAdRequest()
        Creates a PublishedAdRequest.Builder that has appropriately set custom targeting values based on BVAds's personalization data. The Builder is returned to allow further use of PublishedAdRequest.Builder if desired, before passing to getTargetedAdView, getTargetedInterstitialAd, or getTargetedAdLoader.
        Returns:
        PublisherAdRequest.Builder

      • getTargetedAdLoader

        com.google.android.gms.ads.AdLoader.Builder getTargetedAdLoader(android.content.Context context,
                                                                java.lang.String adUnitId)
        Creates a AdLoader.Builder to be used with getTargetedAdRequest in order to request and display a targeted native ads.
        Parameters:
        context - The activity's context
        adUnitId - Your DoubleClick ad's adUnitId, available through DoubleClick's console.
        Returns:
        AdLoader.Builder

      • getTargetedAdView

        com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherAdView getTargetedAdView(android.content.Context context)
        Creates a PublisherAdView to be used with getTargetedAdRequest in order to request and display targeted banner ads.
        Parameters:
        context - The activity's context
        Returns:
        PublisherAdView

      • getTargetedInterstitialAd

        com.google.android.gms.ads.doubleclick.PublisherInterstitialAd getTargetedInterstitialAd(android.content.Context context,
                                                                                         java.lang.String adUnitId)
        Creates a PublisherInterstitialAd to be used with getTargetedAdRequest in order to get and display a targeted intersitial ad.
        Parameters:
        context - The activity's context
        adUnitId - Your DoubleClick ad's adUnitId, available through DoubleClick's console.
        Returns:
        PublisherInterstitialAd
